name: Pirate Captain

trait.name: Flourish
text: The captain adds its Charisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).

trait.name: Sea Legs
text: The captain has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The captain makes two attacks: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Shape Up, Ye Dog (2/Day)
text: Whenever a friendly creature within 30 feet of the captain that can hear it misses with an attack, the captain can yell perilous threats to allow that creature to reroll the attack roll.

description:
Pirate captains spend their lives at sea, earning and keeping command through blood and daring. A captain's impressive sword work and biting words inspire both confidence and fear in a ship's crew. Sigurd "Snake Eyes" is the pirate captain who leads a gang of smugglers in The Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 247
